params.amount: Full USDC amount in 6-decimal units (e.g. 75 USDC = 75_000_000)
params.sessionId: Unique bytes32 identifier (keccak256 of booking ID from DB)

encodeSessionId(string).notice: Helper: encode a booking ID string to bytes32 session key.

fundSession(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Client funds a session. Must approve this contract for `amount` USDC first.

refundClient(bytes32).notice: Refund the full amount to client. Owner only (for disputes/cancellations).

releasePayment(bytes32).notice: Client confirms session complete  releases 95% to mentor, 5% to treasury.         Owner (admin) can also call this to settle.
